name: Pinned Down
Lore: 'Heavy blaster fire hampered Han''s attempts to open the Back Door to the Endor control bunker.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Opponent may not ''react'' away from a battle where you have a blaster present. Also, if you have a blaster present when opponent cancels a battle, draw destiny, opponent loses Force equal to destiny draw. (Immune to Alter.)',
